resources.string: This application cannot run because it does not have the camera permission. The application will now exit.
Face detector dependencies cannot be downloaded due to low device storage

Use this option only if -

1) You have changed your Home Router.

2) You have changed SSID/Password of your Home Router.

Follow these steps.

1) Switch ON your Home Router & make sure it is working properly.

2)Stand near to Wizzo device to be reconfigured.

3)Make sure device is powered ON & wait for 5 minutes than device name will be reflected in mobile WiFi list.

4)Reconfiguration may take 5-10 minutes & you can not interrupt process once started.

1. Your home router is ON & internet connectivity is GOOD 

 2. You have home router's CASE SENSITIVE PASSWORD with you 

 3. Wizzo device is installed PROPERLY, as per given connection diagram* 

 4. ONLY ONE Wizzo device is powered ON at the time of installation 

 5. In your mobile WiFi list you can see SINGLE Wizzo WiFi device* 

 6. Follow instructions on each screen for faster configuration
I have checked & ready to Continue
It may take few minutes depending on your Mobile phone Model, OS, Internet speed.
1. Stay On Screen - Don\'t let Wizzo App go in Background \n\n2. Please keep your wizzo device and mobile in close vicinity while configuration is going on

If it takes too long then

1. Close App COMPLETELY (from background) 

2. Repeat Configuration Process.

1. Stay On Screen - Don't let Wizzo App go in Background

2. Keep your Mobile, Home Router & Wizzo Device is in close vicinity

3. Home Router should have uninterrupted Internet

If app ask your to repeat then 

1. Switch OFF & ON Wizzo Device Immediately after Pressing Repeat Button.

2. Continue doing this till Wizzo Device Get Confiure & Navigate to Home Screen.
